summary.span: 实现 控件中的可选择项。

span.span: Implements a selectable item in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是，这意味着其标头和对象的集合可以是任何类型 （如字符串、 图像或面板）。 is a , which means its header and collection of objects can be of any type (such as string, image, or panel). 有关更多信息，请参见 类。For more information, see the class. 控件可以嵌入在其他控件创建层次结构内的节点控件。 controls can be embedded inside other controls to create a hierarchy of nodes inside a control. 下图显示的层次结构控件内。The following illustration shows a hierarchy of controls inside a . ![TreeView 图](~/add/media/treeviewillustration.JPG "TreeView 图")![TreeView illustration](~/add/media/treeviewillustration.JPG "TreeView illustration") 若要展开或折叠，使用属性。To expand or collapse a , use the property. 有关详细信息控件，请参阅[TreeView 概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/treeview-overview.md)。For more information about the control, see the [TreeView Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/treeview-overview.md). ## 自定义 TreeViewItem 控件Customizing the TreeViewItem Control 若要将相同的属性设置应用到多个控件，使用属性。To apply the same property settings to multiple controls, use the property. 可以修改默认为控件提供唯一外观。You can modify the default to give the control a unique appearance. 有关创建的详细信息，请参阅[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有控件的外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。For more information about creating a , see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). 若要查看的部件和状态的特定于，请参阅[TreeView 样式和模板](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/treeview-styles-and-templates.md)。To see the parts and states that are specific to the , see [TreeView Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/treeview-styles-and-templates.md). 该控件的依赖关系属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style. 如果属性设置为默认样式，该属性可能会更改从其默认值时该控件将出现在应用程序中。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 桌面主题使用应用程序运行时确定的默认样式。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 有关详细信息，请参阅[默认 WPF 主题](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). > [!NOTE] > Visual 属性设置才会影响该属性是否都存在于控件的默认模板，并使用设置。Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in control's default template and is set by using a . 可以在中的"更改可视结构控制"部分中找到的视觉对象属性列表[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有控件的外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建的层次结构中的控件控件。The following example shows how to create a hierarchy of controls in a control. span.span: Provides class handling for a event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果鼠标为 2 的值属性切换到`true`或`false`，这将导致展开或折叠。If the mouse is two, the value of the property switches to `true` or `false`, which causes the to expand or collapse. 此实现将标记事件处理的设置属性的事件数据`true`。This implementation marks the event as handled by setting the property of the event data to `true`.

span.para: 如果重写，均应调用基实现你实现。无法调用基实现可防止基类处理具有类处理程序，这可能会改变最终类的运行时行为的事件。您可以调用基实现之前或之后应用特殊处理，具体取决于您的要求。

If you override , always call the base implementation in your implementation. Failure to call the base implementation prevents base classes from handling the event with a class handler, which might change the run-time behavior of the final class. You can call the base implementation either before or after your special handling, depending on your requirements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所选内容由这时发生该事件到另一个中控件。The event occurs when the selection changes from this to another in a control. 此事件与中的更改时发生的事件属性的控件。This event is related to the event that occurs when there is a change in the property of a control. ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|浮升Bubbling| |委托Delegate|| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将分配的事件处理程序事件，以及如何定义事件处理程序。The following example shows how to assign an event handler for the event to a , and how to define the event handler.
